mapper.select: SELECT id FROM project_task_student WHERE task_id=#{taskId};

SELECT project_task_student.project_id,project_task_student.task_id,project_task_student.student_id, project_task_student.id AS pst_id,resources.id AS resource_id,resources.filename AS file_name FROM (pst_resource INNER JOIN resources ON pst_resource.resource_id=resources.id) INNER JOIN project_task_student on pst_resource.pst_id=project_task_student.id WHERE pst_resource.pst_id=#{pstId} AND resources.type='application/pdf';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repetitive_rate (id, project_id, task_id, student_id, pst_id, resource_id, file_name,contrast_student_id, contrast_resource_id, contrast_file_name, repetitive_rate, repetitive_content) VALUES (NULL,#{projectId},#{taskId},#{studentId},#{pstId},#{resourceId},#{fileName},#{contrastStudentId}, #{contrastResourceId},#{contrastFileName},#{repetitiveRate},#{repetitiveContent})
mapper.select: SELECT repetitive_rate.id, repetitive_rate.project_id, repetitive_rate.task_id, repetitive_rate.pst_id, repetitive_rate.student_id, Student.student_name, repetitive_rate.resource_id, repetitive_rate.file_name, resources.origin_filename, repetitive_rate.contrast_student_id, ContrastStudent.student_name AS contrast_student_name, repetitive_rate.contrast_resource_id, repetitive_rate.contrast_file_name, ContrastResource.origin_filename AS contrast_origin_filename, repetitive_rate.repetitive_rate, repetitive_rate.repetitive_content FROM repetitive_rate JOIN Student ON repetitive_rate.student_id = Student.id JOIN Student AS ContrastStudent ON repetitive_rate.contrast_student_id = ContrastStudent.id JOIN resources ON repetitive_rate.resource_id = resources.id JOIN resources AS ContrastResource ON repetitive_rate.contrast_resource_id = ContrastResource.id WHERE repetitive_rate.task_id=#{taskId} ORDER BY pst_id, repetitive_rate DESC

SELECT repetitive_rate.id, repetitive_rate.project_id, repetitive_rate.task_id, repetitive_rate.pst_id, repetitive_rate.student_id, Student.student_name, repetitive_rate.resource_id, repetitive_rate.file_name, resources.origin_filename, repetitive_rate.contrast_student_id, ContrastStudent.student_name AS contrast_student_name, repetitive_rate.contrast_resource_id, repetitive_rate.contrast_file_name, ContrastResource.origin_filename AS contrast_origin_filename, repetitive_rate.repetitive_rate, repetitive_rate.repetitive_content FROM repetitive_rate JOIN Student ON repetitive_rate.student_id = Student.id JOIN Student AS ContrastStudent ON repetitive_rate.contrast_student_id = ContrastStudent.id JOIN resources ON repetitive_rate.resource_id = resources.id JOIN resources AS ContrastResource ON repetitive_rate.contrast_resource_id = ContrastResource.id WHERE repetitive_rate.pst_id=#{pstId} ORDER BY pst_id, repetitive_rate DESC
